welcome:
🌟 Welcome to MultiLang Translator Bot!

This bot helps you connect with language partners from around the world.

Please choose your language:
no_partners: 😔 No partners found. Try again later!
contact_established: ✅ Chat started! You can now send messages to each other.
new_contact:
🎉 New chat partner!

👤 {name} wants to chat with you!
You can now send messages to each other.
you_disconnected: ❌ You have disconnected from the chat.
no_active_chat: ❌ You don't have an active chat.
age_too_young: ❌ You must be at least 13 years old to use this bot.
profile_incomplete: ❌ Please complete your profile first using /start
error_occurred: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again.
menu_hidden: ✅ Menu hidden. Use /menu to show it again.
help_text:
🤖 **Bot Help**

**Commands:**
/start - Create your profile
/menu - Show main menu
/search - Find a chat partner
/disconnect - End current chat
/profile - View your profile
/help - Show this help

**How to use:**
1. Complete your profile with /start
2. Use /search to find partners
3. Chat with your partner
4. Use /disconnect to end chat
